```{r }

install.packages(c("doParallel", "parallel", "foreach"))

library(doParallel)
library(parallel)
library(foreach)

c <- detectCores() # number of cores: 8

```

```{r }

x1 <- Sys.time()

y = 1

for (i in 1:4000) {
  
  y = mean(rnorm(100000, mean = 10, sd = 3)) 
  
}

x2 <- Sys.time()

RunTime = x2 - x1
RunTime
```

```{r }

cores <- parallel::makeCluster(c - 1) 

doParallel::registerDoParallel(cores)

x1 <- Sys.time()

foreach(i = 1:4000, .combine = rbind) %dopar%{
  
  y = mean(rnorm(100000, mean = 10, sd = 3)) 
    
}

x2 <- Sys.time()

parallel::stopCluster(cores)

RunTime = x2 - x1
RunTime
```
